title: Hi, Liz, We received the sideboard safe and sound. Absolutely thrilled with the condition. Please let Michael know I would not hesitate to get something else off you in the future.
author: Serina

title: Not only is moonee ponds antiques a family owned business but the quality and original antique pieces are remarkable. Everything is also beautifully displayed.
author: Sera Beteramia

title: Michael was very helpful, prompt and friendly.  Would definitely recommend him to everyone.
author: Jo Moore

title: Fantastic customer service and so many gorgeous pieces in store! Michael was amazing to deal with, gave us plenty of time and space to explore Melbourne's best vintage shop and was very knowledgable of the items. The shop itself is beautifully laid out and really helps you explore the items. We had a fabulous experience shopping here.
author: Go≈õka K

title: I've bought several things from this amazing family owned gem! I do not know how they manage to have such great prices but am so grateful as I am a homebody and love, without breaking the bank, making my home my castle and sanctuary. Visiting MP Antiques is always a pleasure, though I have to be careful as never have I gone without seeing things I want! They also do restoration and their service is first rate, everyone who works at MP Antiques is just lovely to deal with. Do yourself a huge favour, save your many, don't bother with the over-priced stores on the 'other' side of town, go to Moonee Ponds Antiques.
author: Julie Vulin
